alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 12:31PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Marshall, southwestern Fayette and southeastern Shelby Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1230 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Collierville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Collierville, Holly Springs, Mt Pleasant, Slayden, Piperton, Rossville, Moscow, Cayce, Elba, Early Grove, Taska, Kirk, Atway, Hays Crossing, Mack and Mahon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
